prompt: The candidate is 35  years old, has 12 years of experience in IT and has experience in system administration . has worked in unix,linux,  Kubernetes and cloud technologies as a devops engineer .Candidate is well aware of  infrastructure as code concept and  well versed with different cloud vendor offering such as AWS , azure , GCP . Candidate has worked in  3 international companies working out of india

The candidate is 42 year german language teacher from india . She has 7 years of  experience of teaching german in india for CBSE and ICSE schools . She has completed all certifications notably A1, A2 , B1, B1 , C1 ,C2 .Before  becoming german teacher , she was working in software industry as quality analyst for 8 years .

Candidate is engineering director in a software product company in pune , india . In a span of 25 years of industry experience , he has started from software engineer as role and moved on to higher level such as team lead  , software manager and director . He has worked mainly on banking products which are delivered to corporate customers . Speciality product development , architecture , localisation and customisation , engineering release management

The candidate is 42 years old. Candidate has extensive experience in product management space for banking and finance .  Candidate has developed core banking product called as infosys finacle . He has taken active installations of finacle from 10 to 105 across multiple geographies . Education front , candidate has done MBA from premier institute indian institute of management bangalore . Candidate has rose through ranks of business analyst and now a principle product manager.
The candidate is 24 years management graduate out of MBA institute. Has mostly internship experience of 1 year in ICICI bank. Has knowledge of relationship banking

The candidate is 28  years old, has 7  years of experience in IT and has experience in database administration of large oracle databases . He has extensive experience in backup,  recovery , security partitioning , managing disks .  Candidate has lot of experience in application space , tuning queries , index creation and suggestions .  Candidate has experience in noSQL databases such as MongoDB , cassandra etc . He has mostly worked in large captives centres of   citibank , goldman sachs , barclays
